dict.acceptation: 以前的，从前的；在前的；前任的；
模型，样板；构成者，创造者；起形成作用的人；[无线]线圈架；

sent.orig: Of course, many quit the faith, but he remains a global opinion-former.
sent.trans: 当然，许多人放弃了信仰，但它仍然是一个全球舆论制造者(opinion-former)。

sent.orig: Sam Casella, former president of APA, former president of AICP.
sent.trans: 山姆。卡塞拉，美国规划协会前主席，美国规划师协会主席。

sent.orig: Scot Faulkner worked for former President Ronald Reagan and former House Speaker Newt Gingrich.
sent.trans: 斯科特。福克纳曾经为前总统罗纳德。里根和前国会众院议长纽特。金里奇工作过。

sent.orig: We should sincerely help former work personnel and stop calling them "former personnel"
sent.trans: 对旧工作人员也要诚恳地给予帮助，不要口口声声称人家“旧人员”

sent.orig: This group is led by former Secretary of State James Baker and former Congressman Lee Hamilton.
sent.trans: 该小组是由美国前国务卿詹姆斯·贝克和前国会议员李·汉米尔顿领导的。
